item.title: FBI searching former Trump adviser John Bolton's home
item.description: Federal agents were seen Friday morning searching the Maryland residence of former Trump national security adviser John Bolton, ABC News has learned.

item.title: Famine determined in parts of Gaza, 500,000 experiencing 'catastrophic' hunger
